pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast, Easy-to-Use Tool for Manipulating Tables in Databases and a Wrapper of MADlib // Provides an R interface for the 'VMware Data Stack' running on 'PostgreSQL' or 'Greenplum' databases with parallel and distributed computation ability for big data processing. 'PivotalR' provides an R interface to various database operations on tables or views. These operations are almost the same as the corresponding native R operations. Thus users of R do not need to learn 'SQL' when they operate on objects in the database. It also provides a wrapper for 'Apache MADlib', which is an open-source library for parallel and scalable in-database analytics.
